author: Wil Day

author: Miriam Waldvogel
description: Churches and other houses of worship registered as tax-exempt nonprofits can endorse political candidates to their congregations, the IRS said on Monday. The decision, first reported in The New York Times, was communicated in a court filing intended to settle a lawsuit filed by two Texas churches and a group of Christian broadcasters. 501(c)(3) nonprofit...
title: IRS says churches can endorse political candidates to congregations

description: President Trump told reporters Monday that he planned to visit Texas on Friday after deadly flash floods swept through central Texas over the weekend. At least 100 people are dead across six counties, including more than two dozen counselors and young campers from a Christian summer camp for girls. “That was a terrible event, terrible...
title: Trump confirms he will travel to Texas on Friday after fatal flooding

author: Rachel Frazin
description: President Trump on Monday directed the Treasury Department to take a strict approach to limit which projects can get access to wind and solar tax credits. The recently passed Republican megabill ends the tax credits for wind and solar tax credits unless solar or wind farms start producing electricity by 2028 – or unless they start construction...
